original: The architecture of Winchester College is a diverse set of architectural styles, reflecting the multiple periods of building from the college's foundation in 1382, through additions in the medieval and Early Modern periods, to a major expansion of accommodation in the Victorian era and then further extensions at the turn of the 20th century and more recently.
simplified: Winchester College’s architecture includes a variety of architectural styles. || This reflects multiple periods of building from when the college was founded in 1382 way until its most recent extensions. || This includes additions made during the medieval and Early Modern periods and a major expansion of accommodation in the Victorian era.

original: Repeatedly besieged during the War of Restoration of Independence, it was during the siege of the city of Elvas, led by the Spanish commander Don Luis de Haro in 1658, that the fort stood out for its defenders' heroic resistance.
simplified: It was often attacked during the War of Restoration of Independence. || In 1658, the Spanish commander Don Luis de Haro attacked the city of Elvas, and the defenders of the fort gave their lives to save the city.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia looks similar to other Ernettiomorphs. || It is similar due to its overall leaf-like body and thin ribs, but is different due to its smaller petaloids and the location of its ribs.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia looks similar to other types of fossils from Namibia, with a leaf-like body, thin ribs, and rod shaped bodies. || However, it is different from other similar fossil classes because it has smaller petals and a different rib configuration.

original: Repeatedly besieged during the War of Restoration of Independence, it was during the siege of the city of Elvas, led by the Spanish commander Don Luis de Haro in 1658, that the fort stood out for its defenders' heroic resistance.
simplified: The city of Elvas was besieged multiple times during the War of Restoration of Independence, but in 1658 Don Luis de Haro led a particularly memorable siege. || The fort was particularly noted for its heroic defenders who successfully defended the area.

original: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 on progressives and liberals, although Biden had previously rejected calls to "defund the police", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.
simplified: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 on progressives and liberals, although Biden has previously rejected calls to "defund the police ", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.

original: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 on progressives and liberals, although Biden had previously rejected calls to "defund the police", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.
simplified: Republicans have attributed the rise in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 to progressives and liberals, whereas Biden had declined to support the "defund the police" slogan, favored by racial justice activists.

original: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 and 2021 on progressives and liberals, although Biden had previously rejected calls to "defund the police", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.
simplified: Republicans have blamed the increase in violent crime and homicides in 2020 on progressives and liberals. || Biden previously rejected calls to "defund the police ", a slogan supported by racial justice protesters.

original: Musk stated that Twitter Blue's pricing would be raised to around US$8.00 per-month, and include reduced advertising on the Twitter service, the ability to post longer audio and video files, and verified account status.
simplified: Musk stated that Twitter Blue's prices would be raised to around US$8.00 per month, and include reduced advertising on the Twitter service, the ability to post longer audio and video files, and verified account status.

original: On November 5, 2022, FIFA sent out a letter to all participating nations telling them to cease and avoid any further or current discussion of Qatar's poor human rights records to "respect all opinions and beliefs, without handing out moral lessons to the rest of the world" and to "focus on the football."
simplified: FIFA told all participating nations to stop talking about Qatar's human rights records on November 5, 2022. || They wanted everyone to "respect all opinions and beliefs without telling the rest of the world what to do" and urged people to "focus on the football."

original: Major American and British oil producers reported record profits in 2022, rewarding their shareholders with dividends and stock buybacks rather than following their past practice of plowing profits back into more production.
simplified: In 2022, major oil producers in the US and UK earned record profits, giving money to their shareholders in the form of dividends and stock buybacks instead of reinvesting their profits in further production.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Previous protests in Iran had been about election results and economic troubles, and the government had responded violently. || Now, protesters want more rights for women, but their main goal is to end the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Unlike earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrowing of the Islamic Republic.

original: Whereas earlier major protests, which were violently quelled by Iran's government, focused on election results or economic woes, the current protest, besides increased rights for women, has one main demand: the overthrow of the Islamic Republic.
simplified: Earlier protests, which were forcefully put down by Iranian authorities, dealt with election results or financial difficulties. || Now, the current demonstration is demanding the collapse of the Islamic Republic, in addition to more rights for women.

original: In addition to farming, Corbin has expanded his business to include agritourism, using his farm to host weddings, host corporate meetings, and attract visitors to a large annual Christmas-themed display.
simplified: Corbin runs a farm, and has also opened it up to agritourism, holding weddings and business meetings there, as well as hosting a big Christmas event every year to draw in visitors.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia. || It has a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia looks similar to other erniettomorphs from Namibia. || It has a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia has a leaf-like body, thin ribs, and spindle-shaped bodies, similar to most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia. || However, it is distinguished from other taxa like Pteridinium and Rangea by its smaller petaloids and the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.

original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.
simplified: Nasepia looks like most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with a leaf-like body and thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies. || However, it has smaller petaloids and the configuration of its ribs run close to its axis, which sets it apart from Pteridinium and Rangea.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: Ion Iliescu was re-elected in 2019, winning by a landslide. || Since then, his second term has been challenged by the COVID-19 pandemic and the unstable political situation created by his corruption-tainted ally governments in 2020, including the Social Democrats which he has chosen to remain in power, even more than in his first term.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: In 2019, Klaus Iohannis defeated PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a large margin. || His second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and considerable political instability. || He has backed corrupt governments in the 2020 legislative elections, which include his closest allies - the social democrats, who he has even more strongly supported than Ion Iliescu.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections.

original: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.
simplified: After defeating PSD candidate Viorica Dăncilă by a landslide in 2019, his second term has been marked by the COVID-19 pandemic and by tremendous political instability given the corrupt governments he has endorsed after the 2020 legislative elections, in their composition being also his closest political allies, the social democrats, which he has endorsed at governance even more than Ion Iliescu.

original: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
simplified: Director Samuel Fuller removed the character of Gary and replaced Seberg with a different actor in the first film adaptation. || He also changed the story to make it a horror movie about the dog. || In contrast, director Barbeau-Lavalette stayed true to the original book.

original: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
simplified: Unlike the first movie, Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror movie centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.

original: Described as a darkly comedic bio-pic, Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner?" with Fogel also on board to direct.
simplified: It is described as a darkly comedic bio-pic. || Emilia Jones will play the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner? || ".

original: Described as a darkly comedic bio-pic, Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner?" with Fogel also on board to direct.
simplified: Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner? || ".

original: Described as a darkly comedic bio-pic, Emilia Jones was confirmed to be portraying the whistle-blower Reality Winner from a script written by Kerry Howley based on her own 2017 New York Magazine feature, "Who Is Reality Winner?" with Fogel also on board to direct.
simplified: Emilia Jones has been confirmed to play the part of Reality Winner, the whistleblower, in a darkly comedic bio-pic. || The script was written by Kerry Howley, based on her 2017 New York Magazine feature "Who Is Reality Winner? || ", and Fogel will direct the film.
